title: Bill Bratton, The Profession: A Memoir of Community, Race, and the Arc of Policing in America
description:
Former NYPD commissioner Bill Bratton discusses his leadership in law enforcement over three decades and offers his thoughts on policing in America today. He's interviewed by Charles Ramsey, former Philadelphia police commissioner and Metropolitan DC Police chief.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
